Package game.terrains

Class Fountain

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.Ground
game.terrains.Fountain
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, Consumable
Direct Known Subclasses:
HealthFountain, PowerFountain
public abstract class Fountain extends Ground implements Consumable
A class that represents the Fountain type.

      public ActionList allowableActions​(Actor actor, Location location, String direction)

      allowableActions in class Ground
      Parameters:
      actor - the Actor acting
      location - the current Location
      direction - the direction of the Ground from the Actor

    • tick

      public void tick​(Location location)
      Inform the Fountain on the ground of the passage of time. This method is called once per turn, if the fountain rests upon the ground. Overrides Ground.tick()
      Overrides:
      tick in class Ground
      Parameters:
      location - The location of the Ground
      See Also:
      Ground.tick(Location)

      Returns:
